name: Flowah
description: Every rose has its thorns, but you'll find that the Flowah tends to be a little more 'thorn' than 'rose.' This burly beast may seem like a curmudgeon, but beneath its prickly exterior lies a soul that's sweeter than honeysuckle.
cost: Haven, Light, Psychic: 50 Relics, Amber: 10 Relics
breedingTime: Breeding Time: 10 hr, Enhanced Time: 7 hr 30 min
